oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Tokyo, Japan - 1972 - part 6
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part six of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Tokyo, Japan at Budo Kahn Hall. Featuring Tex Ritter (host/performer), Brian Collins (performer), and Wanda Jackson (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Ritter; Brian Collins; Wanda Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Tex Ritter talks and introduces the next tune -- (01:12) Rye Whiskey (Tex Ritter) -- (06:47) Ritter thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (07:40) The Ballad Of High Noon (Tex Ritter) -- (10:53) Tex Ritter thanks the audience and introduces the band -- (12:00) Ritter introduces Brian Collins -- (12:26) Wonder Could I Live There Anymore (Brian Collins) -- (14:09) The Last Thing On My Mind (Brian Collins) -- (14:55) Collins thanks the audience and talks about his idols -- (15:23) I Walk The Line (Brian Collins, Johnny Cash impersonation) -- (16:30) I'm Moving On (Brian Collins, Hank Snow impersonation -- (16:50) Love's Gonna Live Here Again (Brian Collins, Buck Owens impersonation) -- (17:20) Brian Collins, Elvis impersonation -- (19:26) Orange Blossom Special (Brian Collins) -- (21:49) Crawdad Hole (Brian Collins) -- (23:48) Ritter thanks Collins and introduces Wanda Jackson -- (24:47) Silver Threads And Golden Needles (Wanda Jackson) -- (26:16) In The Middle Of A Heartache (Wanda Jackson) -- (27:54) Jackson thanks the audience in both English and Japanese
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Collins, Brian, 1950-; Jackson, Wanda, 1937-;
